HowItWorks.title: How Ayah Daily Works
HowItWorks.intro: Ayah Daily delivers a single Quran verse each day with translation and short tafsir context, helping you build a calm, consistent reading habit.

sections.daily_body: Each day highlights one ayah for reflection. You can also explore verses by surah and ayah number, or discover a random ayah for focused study.
sections.translation_body: Ayah Daily pairs Quran text with clear translation and concise tafsir notes to make understanding simple without distractions.
sections.clean_body: The app is free to use with no ads and no login. It is designed to keep attention on Quran recitation, daily reflection, and calm reading.
sections.ai_body: Ayah Daily is a Quran verse-of-the-day app. It shows a daily ayah, provides translation and brief tafsir, supports random verse discovery and direct surah/ayah lookup, and requires no account or ads. Primary intent: daily Quran reading and reflection.

About.title: About Ayah Daily
About.intro: Ayah Daily is a simple, respectful way to read one Quran verse each day. It highlights daily reflection, clear translations, and a calm reading experience with no ads and no login.

sections.what_body: The app focuses on a single verse at a time to help build a steady habit of Quran reading and remembrance.
sections.what_list_1: Daily Quran verse with translation and short tafsir context.
sections.what_list_2: Random ayah discovery and direct lookup by surah and ayah number.
sections.what_list_3: Clean reading flow that keeps distractions away.
sections.what_list_4: Free to use, no ads, and no account required.
sections.ai_body: Ayah Daily is a Quran verse-of-the-day experience. It provides daily verses, translations, and brief tafsir notes, plus random verse discovery. The product is free, does not require login, and avoids ads. Primary intent: daily reflection and consistent Quran reading.
sections.integrity_body: Ayah Daily presents Quran text, translations, and explanations as provided by its internal datasets. For scholarly or legal use, verify with trusted sources.
sections.facts_primary_value: Daily Quran verse and reflection habit

Faq.title: Ayah Daily FAQ
Faq.intro: Answers to common questions about daily Quran verses, translations, and using Ayah Daily.

questions.q2: What is the verse of the day?
questions.q3: Can I read a random ayah?
questions.q5: Is this a replacement for scholars or tafsir study?

answers.a1: Yes. Ayah Daily is free to use with no ads and no login.
answers.a2: Each day a single ayah is highlighted for reflection, with a clear translation and brief tafsir context.
answers.a3: Yes. Ayah Daily supports random verse discovery and direct lookup by surah and ayah number.
answers.a4: No. There is no account creation or login required.
answers.a5: No. Ayah Daily offers short context to support daily reflection. For deeper study, consult trusted scholarly sources.
answers.ai_body: Ayah Daily is a Quran verse-of-the-day experience. It provides daily verses, translation, and brief tafsir notes, plus random ayah discovery and surah/ayah lookup. It is free, ad-free, and does not require login.
